message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. We can negotiate further, but I think this is a good starting point.
I think a 55/45 split in my favor is a more equitable starting point, considering the inflation effect. We can continue negotiating, but this reflects our respective losses in value with each round.

Okay, let's compromise.  Since you're gaining more value each round, I'm willing to move closer to your initial proposal.  I'm offering 4750 for me, and 5250 for you. Let's wrap this up before the inflation eats away too much more of my share.
